data.message: Coca-Cola are responsible for 500 billion bottles of single use plastic being sold every year in which can not be recycled so are washing up on shores in the masses on all corners of the earth 🌏 which is killing the environment and ozone layer

replies.message: Hi Mark, 100% of our packaging is 100% recyclable. We’ve spent many years ensuring all of our drinks packaging is fully recyclable, from our lids to the type of glue we use to stick on the labels and the colour of PET plastic. For more information on our sustainability plan visit: http://spr.ly/61848A6ME
Coca-Cola Thanks for the reply, could you please then explain the article in the link below then ? https://www.greenpeace.org.uk/coke-campaign-goes-global/
